text: The 2010 La Flèche Wallonne cycling race took place on 21 April 2010. It was the 74th running of the La Flèche Wallonne between Charleroi and Huy in Belgium. It was won by the World Champion Cadel Evans.Evans conquers the Mur de Huy ==Teams== There were 25 teams for the 2010 La Flèche Wallonne. title: 2010 La Flèche Wallonne
